description: Developed a stylized, interactive, and fully functioning web front-end for a locker rental site using Vue.js
Created and implemented 17 unit tests for the locker rental site using Jest software
Completed 5 professional development certifications, including courses on JavaScript, Vue.js, and PHP to increase productivity and provide employer with greater value
Designed a customizable, flexible, and reusable Polymer dropdown component for use across multiple pages of a web application
Participated actively in an Agile-based development environment, including leading several daily stand-up meetings
Utilized version control software to reduce code duplication and to provide and receive feedback
Increased application functionality and efficiency while using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, React.js, and Polymer to create new features and improve existing site behavior
Collaborated with project managers, designers, and team members to produce inspiring user experiences that were cross-browser compatible for both desktop and mobile devices in 20 languages
Regularly identified, documented, and resolved code defects, resulting in a more robust genealogy website
